subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: As he walks down Oakmont’s front nine, Jim Weathers is greeted by a player’s wife, stopped by a salesman pitching a miracle soaking treatment for achy golfers and recognized by a spectator as “that guy on the Golf Channel.”
snippet: As he walks down Oakmont’s front nine, Jim Weathers is greeted by a player’s wife, stopped by a salesman pitching a miracle soaking treatment for achy golfers and recognized by a spectator as “that guy on the Golf Channel.”
